mapper.select: SELECT QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_NAME, QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_GROUP, QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_CLASS_NAME, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP, QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.CRON_EXPRESSION, QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TIME_ZONE_ID, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_STATE, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.NEXT_FIRE_TIME, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.PREV_FIRE_TIME, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.START_TIME, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.END_TIME, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.MISFIRE_INSTR FROM QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS ON QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_NAME = QRTZ_TRIGGERS.JOB_NAME AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME = QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP = QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP WHERE QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_GROUP = #{JOB_GROUP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
